text: Litchfield is a town in Kennebec County, Maine, United States. The population was 3,586 at the 2020 census. Litchfield is included in the Augusta, Maine micropolitan area. Litchfield was incorporated in 1795. It was originally known as Smithtown Plantation. ==Other websites== * Litchfield, Maine Official Website * Historical Society of Litchfield, Maine Category:Towns in Maine
title: Litchfield, Maine
